definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the tropics , the equatorial region between 23 degrees north and 23 degrees south .
From, or similar to, a hot , humid climate .
examples: We've had a lot of tropical nights this summer.
My favorite tropical fruits are pineapples and coconuts.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to, involving, or of the nature of a trope or tropes; figurative , metaphorical .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the tropics , the equatorial region between 23 degrees north and 23 degrees south .
secondary_definitions: From, or similar to, a hot , humid climate .
( dated ) Pertaining to, involving, or of the nature of a trope or tropes; figurative , metaphorical .
